channel.title: Can I use my MIDI keyboard controller with Auxy?
channel.description: I have a MIDI keyboard controller (Akai LPK25). I would like to use it to get melodies into Auxy. Possible? Possibly coming soon? Thanks!

item.title: Can I use my MIDI keyboard controller with Auxy?
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
But seriously tho, it’s not currently a possibility and I don’t think the devs have mentioned support for that as of now

Read full topic
